# Setting up your analysis environment

* Create A New Folder called CM3
* Start VS Code
* Add the folder to workspace (CMD/CTRL + P + WORKSPACES ADD FOLDER TO WORKSPACE)
* Create new quarto document (CMD/CTRL + P + QUARTO NEW DOCUMENT)
* Download the data you need for the exercises: <https://cm3-datasets.s3.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/data/data.zip>
* Unzip the data to a new folder called data inside the CM3 folder
